bug.author: vjdtao
bug.description: I'd like to report that the shell script csmsc/voc1/local/data_download.sh breaks at line 24 with an error find: ‘CSMSC/PhoneLabeling’: No such file or directory I removed CSMSC/, and the script works.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vjdtao>@vjdtao</denchmark-link> , thank you for your report! I will fix it in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kan-bayashi/ParallelWaveGAN/pull/83>#83</denchmark-link> .
